title: This gaming PC inside a vintage radio is truly amazing
description: A YouTuber put a gaming PC inside a vintage 1940s Motorola radio case. And the thing actually works!

title: This adapter could stop RTX 4090s from melting — but there’s a catch
description: CableMod has revealed the designs of its upcoming power adapters for the Nvidia RTX 4090. Will this fix the melting problem?

title: Nvidia RTX 4080 is almost here — with wildly varying prices
description: Nvidia's upcoming RTX 4080 graphics card is starting to appear at various retailers, but the prices are very inconsistent.

title: Astronomers spot a huge ‘planet killer’ asteroid between Earth and Venus
description: Astronomers announced they have spotted a huge asteroid nearly a mile wide that could one day intersect with Earth's path.
